thread.title: European stock exchanges look to reel in big trades

author: Financial News
title: European stock exchanges look to reel in big trades
text:
European stock exchanges look to reel in big trades By Follow @_TimCave 15 October 2015 Having spent years courting high-speed traders, some of Europe's biggest stock markets including the London Stock Exchange, Bats Chi-X Europe and Deutsche BÃ¶rse are now cosying up to fund managers with new block trading services.
